DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with candesartan cilexetil for at least 6 months in patients with chronic heart failure improves clinical signs and symptoms of chronic heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Clinical Signs and Symptoms of Chronic Heart Failure in Patients Treated With Candesartan Cilexetil in Croatia
DOC.criteria: Patients with diagnosed chronic heart failure Patients treated for at least 6 months with candesartan cilexetil Signed Informed consent Hypersensitivity to candesartan cilexetil Pregnancy / lactation Severe hepatic impairment
